parsed.internal_thinking: I am placing the first settlement of the game. Looking at the board, Node 20 is one of the highest-yield spots available with 12 pips. It provides a great mix of Wood (11), Brick (6), and Sheep (8), which are crucial for early-game expansion (building roads and settlements). While Node 43 has a higher total pip count (13), it is entirely focused on Wheat, which might leave me resource-starved for expansion early on. By taking Node 20 now, I secure a strong foundation for building, and I can look for Wheat and Ore on my second placement. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: I've secured a strong Wood/Brick/Sheep foundation at Node 20. For my second settlement, I should prioritize Wheat and Ore to balance my production.
parsed.say_outloud: hi all! good luck to everyone. i think i'll start here, looks like a solid spot for some early roads.
